titleStmt.title: A coppie of a letter, read in the House of Commons: sent from Master Sampford, high sheriffe of the countie of Somerset, and the committee there, of their weekly proceedings, in searching the recusants houses. Also the number of such ammunition as was taken in their houses, and sent to the castle at Taunton. Ordered to be printed. Hen. Elsyng, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: Sampford, H.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: August 26. Printed at London for W. Ley,

notesStmt.note: Signed by H. Sampford and 5 others.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
